text: Henry of Burgundy may refer to: *Henry I, Duke of Burgundy (946–1002), sometimes called Eudes Henry or Odo Henry *Henry I of France (1008–1060), also held Burgundy as Henry II *Henry, son of Robert I of Burgundy (1035–1074), son and heir of Robert I, Duke of Burgundy, but died during his father's lifetime; father of two Dukes of Burgundy, and of: **Henry, Count of Portugal (1066–1112), son of Henry of Burgundy
title: Henry of Burgundy
